item.Q:
Write the character:
to own; to host; master; lord; primary
item.A:
zhǔ
主要 zhǔyào main; principal; major; primary

item.Q:
Write the character:
mountain pass; to close; to shut; to turn off; to concern; to involve; surname
item.A:
traditional: 關
guān
有关 (有關) yǒuguān to have something to do with; to relate to; to concern; concerning; related to

shí
十分 shífēn to divide into ten equal parts; very; hundred percent; completely; extremely; utterly; absolutely

item.Q:
Write the character:
between; among; space; (measure word)
item.A:
traditional: 間
jiān
时间 (時間) shíjiān time; period

凤 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 鳳
fèng
凤凰 (鳳凰) fènghuáng phoenix

item.Q:
Write the character:
outside; in addition; foreign; external
item.A:
wài
外国 (外國) wàiguó foreign (country)

item.Q:
Write the character:
(question particle for subjects already mentioned)
item.A:
ne
华达呢 (華達呢) huádáne gabardeen

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: feel; find that; thinking; awake; aware
2: a nap; a sleep
item.A:
traditional: 覺
1: jué 2: jiào
觉得 (覺得) juéde to think; to feel 幻觉 (幻覺) huànjiào hallucination

item.Q:
Write the character:
to make; to cause; to enable; to use; to employ; messenger
item.A:
shǐ
使用 shǐyòng to use; to employ; to apply; to make use of

item.Q:
Write the character:
that; the above-mentioned; most likely; to deserve; should; ought to; owe
item.A:
该 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 該
gāi
应该 (應該) yīnggāi ought to; should; must

yǒu
友好 yǒuhǎo friendly (relations)

item.Q:
Write the character:
ability; talent; endowment; gift; an expert; only (then); only if; just
item.A:
cái
刚才 (剛才) gāngcái just

item.Q:
Write the character:
advance; enter; to come in
item.A:
traditional: 進
jìn
进行 (進行) jìnxíng to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to conduct; to execute

凰 (strokes unavailable)
huáng
凤凰 (鳳凰) fènghuáng phoenix

tā
她们 (她們) tāmen they

item.Q:
Write the character:
the people; nationality; citizen
item.A:
mín
人民 rénmín (the) people

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: particle attached after verb to indicate action in progress, like -ing ending
2: to make known; to show; to prove; to write; book; outstanding
item.A:
traditional: 著
1: zhe 2: zhù
随着 (隨著) suízhe along with; in the wake of; following 显著 (顯著) xiǎnzhù outstanding; notable; remarkable

gè
各个 (各個) gège various

item.Q:

all; whole; entire; every; complete; surname
item.A:
quán
完全 wánquán complete; whole; totally; entirely

traditional: 進行
jìnxíng to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to conduct; to execute
rénmín (the) people

zhǔyào main; principal; major; primary
zhǔyāo important

traditional: 時間
shíjiān time; period
shǐyòng to use; to employ; to apply; to make use of

traditional: 應該
yīnggāi ought to; should; must

traditional: 全國
quánguó entire country; nationwide

traditional: 之間
zhījiān between; among; inter-

traditional: 有關
yǒuguān to have something to do with; to relate to; to concern; concerning; related to
mínzhǔ democracy
shífēn to divide into ten equal parts; very; hundred percent; completely; extremely; utterly; absolutely

traditional: 機關
jīguān organ; mechanism

traditional: 外國
wàiguó foreign (country)

traditional: 各個
gège various
gègè every; various; separately one-by-one
cǐwài besides; in addition; moreover; furthermore

traditional: 中間
zhōngjiàn intermediate
zhōngjiān between; intermediate; mid; middle
quánmiàn all-around; comprehensive; total; overall
dìzhǔ landlord; land-owner
yǐwài apart from; other than; except for; external; outside of

traditional: 這麼
zhème so much; this much; this way; like this
